original: intros [Hcomm [Hgroup [Hintern Hassoc Hdist]]] x y HAx HAy. destruct Hgroup as [_ [Hinv _]]. apply (regular_l S A Add O Opp Hgroup (Mult x y) O). - apply Hinv. apply Hintern. apply HAx. apply HAy. - apply mult_O. + apply (conj Hcomm (conj Hgroup (conj Hintern (conj Hassoc Hdist)))). + apply Hinv. apply Hintern. apply HAy. - apply Hinv in HAy. specialize (Hdist x y (Opp y) HAx HAy). rewrite Hdist. rewrite Hinv. reflexivity.
